## API-Referenz

### POST /api/transcribe

Transkribiert eine hochgeladene Audio-Datei.

**Request:**

- Content-Type: multipart/form-data
- Body: file (Audio-Datei)

**Response:**


analysis.description: Audio Transkriptor transforms uploaded audio files into precise transcripts and AI-extracted todo lists using OpenAI Whisper, saving hours of manual note-taking. Perfect for busy professionals turning meetings, podcasts, and calls into actionable insights with one-click copy-paste.

valueProposition: Instant, accurate audio-to-text transcription with multi-file upload and mobile-first design
AI-powered todo extraction and prioritization from transcripts for immediate actionability
Seamless integration for WhatsApp, meetings, and content workflows with copy-to-clipboard

customerSegments.name: Professionals & Managers (Meetings, Calls)
pain_points: Time lost manually transcribing hours of audio
Missing key action items from discussions

customerSegments.name: Content Creators (Podcasts, Videos)
pain_points: Tedious transcription blocking content repurposing and SEO
No easy way to extract tasks or summaries

customerSegments.name: Teams using WhatsApp/Collaboration Tools
pain_points: Voice notes piling up without searchable text or todos
